pages.text: A distant cousin of the alloy furnace, the Mixer is yet another rather important machine, being used in the production of a variety of useful substances, and key in the production of biofuel. The mixer is a notably slow machine so investing in speed upgrades is not a bad idea.

pages.title: Mixer
pages.text: An important use of this machine is the production of Pink Gel, which cannot be obtained through any other means.
